root.name: Babylon 5: Shadow Wars
root.description: A simple 2D arcade shooter, Shadow Wars has the sad distinction of being the first and only official game based on the Babylon 5 franchise ever released. It was made as a companion to the Babylon 5 Arcade Series Entertainment Utility multimedia CD-ROM by programmer Gene Turnbow in a few weeks.

similar_games.game: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Crossroads of Time
